name: AuthService
desc: A service to handle user authentication and role-based account setup using Firebase.

name: AuthService.new
desc: Creates an instance of AuthService with required Firebase services.

name: createAccount
desc: Creates a new user account with email, password, and assigned role.

name: signInWithEmail
desc: Signs in a user with email and password.

name: calculateAffordability
desc: Calculates an approximate affordable home price based on income, debt, etc.

name: calculatePITI
desc: Calculates the monthly payment for Principal, Interest, Taxes, Insurance (PITI).

name: DefaultFirebaseOptions
desc: Default FirebaseOptions for use with your Firebase apps.

name: Listing
desc:
Represents a real estate listing stored in Firestore.
Subject to change as requirements evolve.

name: Listing.fromFirestore
desc:
Constructs a Listing from a Firestore document snapshot.
Expects fields: title, description, imageUrl, price, address, realtorId, isFavorite.

name: Listing.new
desc: Creates a Listing instance with required properties.

name: address
desc: Address of the property.

name: description
desc: Detailed description of the listing.

name: id
desc: Unique identifier for the listing.

name: imageUrl
desc: URL of the listing's primary image.

name: isFavorite
desc: Indicates if the listing is marked as a favorite.

name: price
desc: Price of the property.

name: realtorId
desc: ID of the realtor managing the listing.

name: title
desc: Title of the listing.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: fetchPropertyData
desc: Fetches detailed property data from Firestore for a given property ID.

name: RealtorSettingsService
desc: A separate service to handle Realtor data load/update

name: loadRealtorData
desc:
Loads realtor data from Firestore.
Returns a Map with the data, or throws an exception on error.

name: updateRealtorData
desc:
Updates the realtor data in Firestore.
Throws an exception if anything goes wrong.

name: Settings
desc:
Represents user settings stored in Firestore.
Subject to change as requirements evolve.

name: Settings.fromFirestore
desc:
Constructs a Settings from a Firestore document snapshot.
Expects fields: userId, isDarkMode, isNotificationsEnabled, isLocationEnabled.

name: Settings.new
desc: Creates a Settings instance with required properties.

name: id
desc: Unique identifier for the settings document.

name: isDarkMode
desc: Indicates if dark mode is enabled.

name: isLocationEnabled
desc: Indicates if location services are enabled.

name: isNotificationsEnabled
desc: Indicates if notifications are enabled.

name: userId
desc: ID of the user associated with these settings.

desc: Unique identifier for the swipe document.

desc: Indicates if the listing was liked (true) or disliked (false).

desc:
Constructs a User from a Firestore document snapshot.

desc: Creates a User instance with required properties.

name: email
desc: User's email address.

name: id
desc: Unique identifier for the user.

desc: Indicates if the user is new (e.g., hasn't completed setup).

name: isRealtor
desc: Indicates if the user is a realtor.

name: lastLoginTime
desc: Timestamp of the user's last login.

name: UserProvider
desc: Manages user data, including role, profile details, clients, and tags.

name: clearUserData
desc: Clears all user data from SharedPreferences and local state.

name: fetchUserData
desc: Fetches user data from Firestore based on the authenticated user.

name: initializeUser
desc: Initializes user data by loading from local storage and fetching from Firestore.

name: isLoading
desc: Indicates if user data is being loaded.

name: loadUserData
desc: Loads user data from SharedPreferences.

name: saveUserData
desc: Saves user data to SharedPreferences.
